item.title: To Use AI the Right Way, Start by Auditing Your Company’s Operating Model
item.description: AI isn’t just another tool layer to plug into existing structures. It fundamentally changes how work should flow.

item.description: From life’s milestones to life’s hardest moments, financial institutions need to do more to build relationships.

item.title: This Startup’s New Product Is Targeting Plastic Pollution With a Novel Kind of Recyclable Packaging
item.description: Exclusive: Cove has developed a fiber-based bottle platform that is designed to be recycled like paper. They plan to make million of units.
